newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Oct 22.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Oct 22.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- King Fahd says 650,000 Saudis to get jobs in civil service.
- Licenses issued for 60 agricultural projects involving a capital investment of 376.75 million riyals.
- 160.9 million riyals allocated for families of handicapped children.
- Tabuk Electricity Company signed on Tuesday a 180 million riyals contract with National Contracting Company to increase TEC's generating capacity.
- Saudi-Yemeni discussions to cooperate on civil aviation.
